Deep Magic: Void
A Large or smaller creature you touch becomes a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.fqbFYtbtkrL53FOC]{gray ooze}. An unwilling target can make a Constitution saving throw at the end of each of its turns to end the effect and resume its normal form. A willing target can choose to become unwilling at any point of the duration and can make a saving throw at the end of its next turn after becoming unwilling. While under the effect of this spell, a creature retains its size, general shape, and alignment and its Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma ability scores but otherwise has the statistics of a gray ooze. If the spell ends because the duration elapses, the target is permanently transformed into a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.fqbFYtbtkrL53FOC]{gray ooze}.
At Higher Levels. If you cast this spell using a 6th-level slot, the target transforms into your choice of a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.3fzQVYQhXxCXRa2o]{gelatinous cube} or an @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.xBhG7Dos3tkg9jWz]{ochre jelly} instead of a gray ooze. If cast using an 8th-level slot, the target becomes a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.NwQpeeaMxAC3fRft]{black pudding} instead of a gray ooze.
